as a car enthusiast who enjoys diy projects there are certain tasks that i prefer to entrust to a professional mechanic honda provides incredibly detailed service manuals that guide you through every possible task even the complex process of removing an entire engine however sometimes these instructions may call for specialized tools or techniques that i dont feel confident enough to handle independently thats where honmannnservice comes in  their expertise and quality service has proved reliable although their office lighting could be improved the waiting area is reasonably comfortable

after experiencing japanese noodles from different places the ramen bar i tried was satisfactory initially the restaurant seemed to exude an authentic vibe making me expect a lot while the taste of their soups and noodles was pleasantly clean i ended up feeling let down when it came to the quantity of vegetables and toppings they served especially considering the price some extras were charged which only added to the disappointment additionally at a whopping cost of 910 per noodle i missed the essential experience of combining fresh vegetables and meat while enjoying the japanese ramen nonetheless the establishment succeeded in providing a great ambiance with welllit spaces and attractive decor

the patrons were incredibly friendly and the quality of the food was notably good my selection comprised a chicago dog and a cheeseburger while the chicago dog met my expectations leading me to potentially order it again i seem to be among the minority who did not find the burger patty exceptional even though it supposedly won an award it reminded me more of the perfectly circular frozen patties readily available at grocery stores lacking the freshness and juiciness characteristic of other awardwinning burgers ive enjoyed elsewhere interestingly my friends choice of a polish sausage proved to be truly delectable consequently i plan to return to this establishment in order to sample additional items from their menu with the hope of adjusting my rating upwardly

the customer experience at this stores delibistro is consistently terrible despite my regular visits as i work nearby i am always attended to at the very last moment after enduring prolonged neglect this unfavourable encounter initially occurred during breakfast when i finally secured assistance and ordered a number 1 meal however the staff seemed unaware of its contents and instead asked me to specify my preferences without any knowledge of what was advertised consequently i opted for a few items from the hot case only to discover additional charges for biscuits and gravy which were not included in the meal while scooping my food the staff didnt hesitate to express their disinterest in serving breakfast implying that it remains unsold becomes stale and eventually discarded unfortunately this unpleasant experience continued as i found my potatoes overcooked and dehydrated the biscuits drenched in unappetizing gravy and the eggs old and crusty upon reaching my workplace

i visited this restaurant in las vegas for lunch based on the positive reviews from yelp users and they were correct the sandwiches here are amazing if they opened a branch in salt lake city i would definitely come here at least once a week i ordered the chicken caesar wrap with chicken noodle soup the soup was decent but nothing out of the ordinary however the sandwich was absolutely delicious im not sure what kind of dressing they use but it was incredibly addictive my boyfriend had the club sandwich and he also agreed that the food here is fresh and tasty plus the prices are reasonable compared to other places in vegas so it wont break the bank if youre looking for a scrumptious and affordable sandwich this is the place to go

immerse yourself in the wonders of this splendid outdoor space that boasts an array of attractions suitable for all age groups from an invigorating splash pad to enthralling playgrounds designed exclusively for children a lively basketball court catering to sports enthusiasts and abundant shaded dining zones perfect for entertaining guests – this place has it all moreover you can explore a mesmerizing little cactus garden teeming with diverse plant and animal life maintained diligently and illuminated generously this park never fails to deliver an extraordinary experience just be wary of some individuals on bicycles who may exhibit lance armstronglike behavior though the majority of visitors are considerate overall this park radiates familyfriendly charm and ensures hours of endless enjoyment

the ramen bar experience was decent but having tried various japanese noodle establishments before i may have had higher expectations for the authentic vibe that initially impressed me about the restaurant while i did enjoy the clean flavor of their soup bases and noodles i was extremely let down by the limited amount of vegetables and toppings they included considering the price – some of which even incurred an additional cost moreover the noodles alone amounted to 910 not accounting for the satisfying combination of chewing fresh vegetables and meat alongside them which is a crucial aspect of the japanese ramen experience nonetheless the restaurant does boast a pleasant atmosphere with welllit surroundings and appealing decorations

words cannot express how extraordinary todd our bartender truly is his remarkable ability to recall my order every time provides an unforgettable experience on every visit sadly the waitresses dont seem to share the same level of excellence in their customer service therefore if you opt for the mouthwatering wings or scrumptious pizza remember to stay close to a restroom within 30 minutes as the spices take it up a notch while having stone ipa on draft is a marvelous addition expanding their selection of craft beers would undoubtedly enhance the overall enjoyment its worth noting that this establishment consistently manages to avoid being overly crowded which is another plus

i had high hopes for this review since i really love the idea of having a rotating theme for a geek brunch unfortunately my experience fell short when it came to the crepe dish it consisted of three dry dough shells stuffed with nicely sauteed and slightly gooey walnuts accompanied by a meager dollop of whipped cream the price suggested something more extravagant but at least the home fries that came with it were chunky and crispy on the drink front the mimosa costing 6 dollars was served in a disappointingly tiny flute they should really try the neverending story mimosa which lives up to its name nonetheless the space itself was incredibly charming overflowing with cute ouija boards and meaningful symbols

statement 2 for the first time ever my partner and i decided to try it out there were plenty of options to choose from and what caught my attention was their innovative approach towards hotdogs we picked the smoked dog and it didnt disappoint tastewise the fries were seasoned with an interesting blend of lawry salt nonetheless the price of 495 for a single hotdog did give us pause while i do acknowledge that the use of highquality ingredients justifies the cost it still felt a bit steep additionally the hotdogs werent particularly big in size so if one finds themselves famished expect to pay around 13 to 15 per individual for two hotdogs fries and a drink – which in my opinion falls on the pricier side

despite my lack of religious beliefs i am truly in awe of the incredible aesthetics of this magnificent church situated in the historic district of old montreal its unparalleled beauty combined with its rich heritage makes it an indispensable tourist spot that should not be missed when visiting montreal

early on a sunday afternoon i ventured into a traditional establishment aiming to have a fulfilling brunch experience unfortunately it turned out to be fairly crowded which added some inconvenience to our hurried state consequently the wait for our lunches appeared overly prolonged although under different circumstances it might have been acceptable nevertheless i must admit that i found the menu delightful highlighting various captivating culinary delights from wisconsin notably the enticing cheese platters the overall ambiance encompassed a pleasing juxtaposition of refined yet hospitable elements all presented at reasonable prices and accompanied by flavorsome dishes while my personal preference didnt align with the grilled vegetable sandwich due to its unexpected olive spread resulting from my negligence in reading the menu closely i can acknowledge that it was skillfully prepared paired perfectly with excellent fries therefore taking everything into account there were no major complaints during this dining experience as a whole

the freerange quail stuffed with foie gras calle was to die for really everything on that dish meshed well together a must trynnthe appetizer which is the sea urchin on top of beef gelatin covered in pea soup was really boring i just didnt get the concept you want the uni to shine but all that other gelatin and pea soup just covered the flavor not complement it there was also a texture issue its like youre eating a mouthful of savory jello which was not to my liking there should just be something to chew in that sort of dish otherwise i feel like im eating pureed baby food other than that this place is great small portions over priced but tasty

i had dinner at this restaurant with my family on the first night in town it had a sophisticated ambiance not quite oldschool but also not like a ruths chris steakhouse we were seated in a booth and our young waitress informed us about two specials veal chop and a type of fish my grandmother loves veal chops so we encouraged her to order one the menu was enticing and this restaurant served all sides separately i ordered a mediumrare rib eye while my grandmother and i decided to share a caesar salad and a baked potato meanwhile my mom ordered a salad and stepfather opted for prime rib with a potato

this park offers a wide range of amenities that cater to different interests and preferences families can take advantage of the splash pad two playgrounds and basketball court for recreational activities additionally there are ample shaded areas provided for leisurely dining visitors can also explore a charming cactus garden that showcases an array of plants and animals the parks excellent upkeep ensures it remains welllit and tidy at all times while most cyclists respect other parkgoers its advised to stay cautious of those who exhibit reckless behavior in summary this park provides a fantastic experience for the entire family

it baffles me how unaware i was about what a torta was by some strange happenstance i held a memory of tortas being presented on hard bread resembling bricklike pita perhaps it stemmed from traumatic experiences at taco bell but i cannot be certain when my friend suggested tortas la presa i approached the idea hesitantly believing i did not enjoy tortas yet i soon realized my perception was sorely mistaken despite my gringaness the primarily spanishspeaking staff proved immensely helpful and accommodating thankfully the menu boasted ample visual aids in the form of photographs delightfully these tortas were served on soft freshly baked bolillo rolls although the exact name eludes me the one i tasted featured carne queso fresco avocado lettuce and tomatoes meanwhile my friend opted for a torta with mozzarella cheese both variations were absolutely delectable as i savored every bite i found solace in watching soccer on the generously sized tv screen and i complemented my meal with an exquisitely sweetened horchata my anticipation to return and sample each enticing dish from their menu is palpable it goes without saying that tortas la presa leaves a lasting impression

this place offers a truly delightful dish of freerange quail stuffed with foie gras its flavors blend harmoniously making it an absolute musttry on the other hand the sea urchin appetizer served atop beef gelatin and pea soup disappoints the concept behind it is confusing as the gelatin and soup seem to mask rather than enhance the outstanding flavor of the uni furthermore its texture resembles that of savory jello which isnt to my taste in my opinion such a dish should contain more substance to chew on instead of feeling like pureed baby food nevertheless despite these concerns this place excels overall offering great dining experiences with smaller portions but tasty dishes that come at a slightly higher price point

i was extremely satisfied with the service provided at this place my dealer recommended them to me when i had a nail in my tire and only a few hours before my final exam the staff there took care of me promptly mentioning that they would attempt to repair it otherwise i would need to replace the tire since time was a concern for me i felt quite anxious especially considering that there were five cars waiting behind me however the technician fixed it amazingly fast providing me with great relief as i couldnt spare enough time to change the tire to my delight he informed me that everything was resolved and there would be no charge for their assistance he was exceptionally friendly and i truly value individuals who deliver exceptional service especially when they are under significant pressure without hesitation i will certainly return to this place if i encounter a similar situation in the future

the individuals exhibited great kindness and the cuisine was quite satisfactory i opted for a chicagostyle hot dog in addition to a cheeseburger the former was acceptable and i would consider ordering it again however contrary to popular opinion that their burger was awardwinning i found the patty reminiscent of generic frozen patties available at grocery stores—not as fresh and succulent compared to other acclaimed burgers i have savored elsewhere on a positive note my companion highly praised their polish sausage i intend to revisit this establishment to sample more items from their menu and hopefully revise my rating accordingly

before leaving las vegas i decided to try out this dining establishment for lunch based on the feedback from yelp users and they were absolutely right this place is fantastic for sandwiches if they ever opened a branch in salt lake city i would definitely become a regular customer probably visiting at least once a week for my meal i ordered the chicken caesar wrap along with a bowl of chicken noodle soup the soup was enjoyable although it was pretty standard however the sandwich oh boy im not sure what kind of dressing they use but it was incredibly addictive my boyfriend opted for the club sandwich and agreed with me about how fresh and delicious everything tasted here plus the prices are quite reasonable unlike many other food establishments in vegas eating here wont break your budget if youre craving a scrumptious and reasonably priced sandwich then this is the place to be

i chose the rib eye cooked medium rare while grandma and i decided to share a caesar salad and a baked potato my mom ordered a salad and my stepfather opted for prime rib with a potato as well our salads arrived along with some bread but i was surprised to see that instead of splitting the salad in the kitchen they brought the salad and an extra plate in this kind of establishment considering the prices and the current economy i found it offputting but i let it go

our salad and bread arrived simultaneously which surprised me since i expected them to prepare and serve the salad in the kitchen although it didnt meet my expectations considering the prices and the current economy i let it go our meals arrived on hot plates and both the veal chop and rib eye looked delicious however my rib eye had butter and an overpowering spicy rub which i disliked especially without a gallbladder the prime rib according to others at the table tasted good when the waitress returned which took quite some time i pointed out that the menu did not mention the seasoning or butter finishing on the steaks she acknowledged my observation and asked if i wanted another steak at this point i declined as i was already frustrated the ownerchef came to apologize for the steak and i told him it was fine i suggested training the waitstaff to inform customers about the steak preparation and finish he assured me they were trained to do so and that our waitress had overlooked mentioning it in the end i appreciate that this restaurant isnt a chain and that my grandmother enjoyed her meal however the inadequate service for the price and my unsatisfactory meal make me conclude that this place wont be on my list of mustvisit restaurants in town both now and in the future

after venturing into unfamiliar territory together with my partner we were introduced to a plethora of possibilities what captivated me most was the unconventional approach they adopted when it came to sausages our choice the subtly smoked variant did not disappoint in terms of taste accompanied by them were fries which featured a distinctive blend of lawry salt for seasoning nonetheless the price tag raised some eyebrows 495 for a single sausage left us momentarily pondering although i acknowledge that the expense is justified given the usage of premium ingredients its important to highlight that the sausages themselves arent exceptionally hefty accordingly if one finds themselves famished be prepared to shell out a minimum of 13 to 15 per person for two sausages fries and a beverage – a price point that strikes me as somewhat steep

the familiar sights from my youth came rushing back when my spouse and i chanced upon this location during our thanksgiving excursion without hesitation we seized the moment to indulge in something emblematic of vegas – purchasing a clam brimming with uncertainty where the presence or absence of a precious pearl remained unknown following specific instructions to select the bulkiest hairiest and most unattractive clam imaginable we eagerly scoured our surroundings until we discovered an undeniable winner – a clam adorned with intriguing qualities upon cracking open its rough exterior we were elated to uncover a resplendent pink pearl of considerable size however our joy was quickly overshadowed by an unexpected turn of events as the saleswoman launched into an aggressive sales pitch for a complementary ring setting caught off guard we found ourselves entangled in a whirlwind of negotiations witnessing the price surge dramatically from an initially fair 15 to an astonishing 75 nevertheless considering the audacity and allure of las vegas we chose to embrace the situation allowing the saleswoman to deftly embed the pearl into the ring while simultaneously offering a complimentary dive for another clam much to our astonishment our efforts yielded a sizable ivory pearl neatly cradled within a luxurious silk packet graciously provided by the saleswoman herself this exquisite find served as the ultimate memento of our time in vegas symbolizing not only the lavishness synonymous with the city but also encapsulating the thrill and enchantment of our unforgettable experiences the resulting ring exuded a captivating beauty permanently etching our cherished memories in its intricate design
